allow:
Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Initial commit - MAAL LINE Streetwear E-commerce

- Next.js 14 App Router + Tailwind CSS
- Dark gothic streetwear design system
- Components: Navbar, Footer, PromoBar, ProductCard, Button, Badge
- Product images and MAAL logo
- Mobile-first responsive design

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")

Bash(git commit -m "$\(cat <<''EOF''
Add complete database architecture documentation \(42 tables\)

- Core: users, roles, authentication, addresses
- Products: products, variants, categories, images
- Inventory: reservations \(anti-overselling\), movements
- Orders: orders, items, payments, refunds
- Shipments: shipments, items, tracking
- Returns/RMA: returns, items, conditions
- Collections/Drops: collections, products \(streetwear core\)
- Webhooks: events, idempotency keys
- Analytics: events, conversion funnel
- Customer: profiles, wish lists
- Discounts: discounts, usage tracking
- Email: templates, logs
- Advanced: background_jobs, feature_flags, store_credits, security_events
- CHECK constraints for all status fields
- Soft deletes for audit trails
- GIN indexes for array columns \(tags, groups\)

Co-Authored-By: Claude Opus 4.5 <noreply@anthropic.com>
EOF
\)")
